doc.name: Track
doc.description: A model of a track in air traffic control systems. This track can have no more than one aircraft in transit. If there is one in transit, then it rejects all inputs.
doc.author: Maryam Bagheri
doc.port: The input, which is a multiport.
doc.property: The trackId. The initial default is an integer with a value of -1.
The neighbors. The initial value is an array with values {-1, -1, -1}.
A boolean indicating if it is stormy.
